</traits>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

---

When [Forcing Open](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) an object that doesn't have an easy grip, a crowbar makes it easier to gain the necessary leverage. Without a crowbar, prying something open takes a –2 item penalty to the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to Force Open (similar to using a [shoddy item](/Rules.aspx?ID=197)).
